abstract: Catholic Charities of Archdiocese of New York, one of eight agencies supported by New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, helps Jose Alvarez pay for diapers, wipes and clothes for his 4-year-old daughter, who has Down syndrome.

keywords.value: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
keywords.name: organizations

keywords.value: Catholic Charities Archdiocese of New York
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: Kenerly Alvarez, 4, has Down syndrome, and her father is disabled, but the Manhattan family is making progress with the assistance of a center that helps children with developmental delays.
snippet: Kenerly Alvarez, 4, has Down syndrome, and her father is disabled, but the Manhattan family is making progress with the assistance of a center that helps children with developmental delays....

headline.main: The Glorious Achievement of Zipping Up a Sweatshirt
headline.print_headline: Family Settles in New York, Seeking Help for a Child
